sentence: I am with David all the way because Brian Kemp was the WORST governor in the Country on Election Integrity!? Mr. Trump insisted Friday on his Truth Social messaging platform.
title: Perdue Had Trump. In Georgia, Kemp Had Everything Else.

sentence: You're going to have a lot of very strong Trump supporters who are going to vote for Brian Kemp, said Martha Zoller, a talk radio host in Georgia who previously worked for both Perdue and Kemp.
author: Eric Bradner
title: Republicans look to Georgia for a path beyond Trump's 2020 grievances
